import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Button, List } from 'semantic-ui-react'; class Confirmation extends Component{ saveAndContinue = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.nextStep(); } back = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.prevStep(); } render(){ const {values: { productLink, productImage, productName, productDetails, price, quantity, amount, deliveryFrom, deliveryTo, deliveryDate }} = this.props; return(

Confirm your Details

Click Confirm if the following details have been correctly entered

Link: {productLink} Product Image: {productImage} Product Name: {productName} Product Details: {productDetails} Price: {price} Quantity: {quantity} Total: {amount} Delivery From: {deliveryFrom} Delivery To: {deliveryTo} Order Date: {deliveryDate}
) } } export default Confirmation;
